name: @thi.ng/simd
description: WASM based SIMD vector operations for batch processing
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:wasm && yarn build:es6 && node ../../scripts/bundle-module
scripts.build:release: yarn clean && yarn build:wasm && yarn build:es6 && node ../../scripts/bundle-module all
scripts.build:wasm: asc assembly/index.ts -b simd.wasm -t simd.wat --validate --optimize --enable simd --runtime none --importMemory --memoryBase 0 && yarn build:binary
scripts.build:binary:
echo "/** @internal */
export const BINARY = \"$(../../scripts/base64 simd.wasm)\";" > src/binary.ts
scripts.cover: yarn build:test && nyc node --experimental-wasm-simd build/test/*.js && nyc report --reporter=lcov
